headline.main: THOUSANDS MAY LOSE TRACTION JUDGMENTS; Accident Victims in Danger of a Freeze-Out in Federal Court Foreclosure. VERDICTS, BUT NO MONEY Many Helpless Men, Women, and Children Can't Get Satisfaction -- Bondholders Ahead of Them.

docs.abstract: Pending foreclosure endangers over 4,000 accident claims where victims have already recd favorable verdicts but no money; bondholders will be 1st to be paid from foreclosure proceeds
docs.snippet: Pending foreclosure endangers over 4,000 accident claims where victims have already recd favorable verdicts but no money; bondholders will be 1st to be paid from foreclosure proceeds

docs.lead_paragraph: In the opinion of the leaders of the organizations in this city interested in the child labor problem the so-called "Dangerous Trades" bill will probably go through before the close of this session of the Legislature at Albany. The leaders think also that there is some hope for the "Christmas overtime" amendments, which have been reported by the committee.

headline.main: CHILD LABOR BILL LIKELY TO BE PASSED; Those Back of the Measure to Protect Minors in Factories See Light Ahead. DANGEROUS TRADES BARRED New Law Would Also Save Children from Over Work in the Canneries Throughout the State.

docs.abstract: NYS bills barring children from dangerous trades seen likely to pass
docs.snippet: In the opinion of the leaders of the organizations in this city interested in the child labor problem the so-called "Dangerous Trades" bill will probably go through before the close of this session of the Legislature at Albany. The leaders think also...
